name: Deep in the Mountains
description:
Deep in the Mountains is a 2D visual novel based on true stories. Players need to help the woman who was conned by traffickers to escape from an isolated village.

"Trafficking of woman for marriage is the slave trade in modern-day and it has a long history in China. This is because China as a developing country still has many social problems which include state-tolerated sex discrimination and patriarchal values ." (Zhao, 2013)
